attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are bombarded with the term "carbon footprint" and similar crap every day. Global warming is not the fault of motorists. Its about time the governments stopped using it as an excuse to extort money from law abiding motorists, to line their own pockets.
Stop telling lies, stop the propganda campaign against motorists. Enough is enough.

If you want to reduce CO2 emissions that strongly, and save the planet.....stop breathing. That WILL have a massive effect on CO2 emissions, both directly, and in-directly.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
